subtitle: This recipe make a colourful, light meal. Choose firm ripe tomatoes otherwise they might split upon cooking.

method.text: Melt butter in a large pan. Add garlic, spinach and basil and stir well. Cover and cook for 2 min, shaking pan occasionally, until leaves are wilted.
Transfer to a sieve and press out excess liquid. Add nutmeg and season well.

Use a sharp knife to slice the tops off the tomatoes. Use a teaspoon to scoop out seeds and discard. Place tomatoes on a baking tray with the lids. Divide spinach between them, making a hollow in centre of each.
Crack an egg into each tomato, then sprinkle over the cheese. Cover the tray with foil and bake for 20-25 min or until the eggs have set.
Serve with the lids on the side.

title: Baked egg in tomatoes
